bellows.import-yt-playlist-notes: Enter a youtube playlist url or playlist ID below and click the import button next to it to get started.
bellows.import-yt-playlist-msg-already-w: Playlist is currently being imported, please wait
bellows.import-yt-playlist-msg-invalid-k: Please enter a valid youtube playlist url (with list in the querystring) or a playlist ID
bellows.import-yt-playlist-msg-error: Error importing playlist - check the console for details
bellows.import-yt-playlist-msg-key-not-f: Playlist with key {playlistKey} does not exist - check the url or id and try again
